sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import {items} from '../items' import '../styles/detail.css' export class Detail extends Component { state = { items : items } render() { const {items} = this.state console.log(items) return (
{ items.map(idetail => (

{idetail.description}

{idetail.title}



{idetail.metatitle}

{idetail.rating} Star

)) }
) } } export default Detail
